eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A PRACTICE/DEMO WARNING FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Cumberland; Salem, NJ; AT 07:52 AM ON OCT 07, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 08:52 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: THIS IS A TEST. THIS MESSAGE IS FOR PEOPLE IN NEW JERSEY ONLY. At approximately 10:45 AM today a routine test of the Salem and Hope Creek Nuclear Generating Station's siren system was conducted. Officials from the New Jersey Office of Emergency Management advise that there is no emergency at the Salem and Hope Creek Nuclear Generating Station's. For additional information refer to the New Jersey Office of Emergency Management website at www.ready.nj.gov or the Salem and Hope Creek Emergency Plan Information Brochure. Delaware residents should contact the Delaware Emergency Management Agency. THIS IS A TEST
